Table of Contents

Interface IDatabaseCleanupService

Namespace
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.Interfaces.Services
Assembly
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.dll

Service interface for database maintenance and cleanup operations. Orchestrates cleanup workflows, manages configuration, and coordinates between business rules and data access layers.

public interface IDatabaseCleanupService

Remarks

This service centralizes all database maintenance operations including:

  • Automated and manual cleanup of old articles and logs
  • Image cache management to prevent disk space exhaustion
  • Database integrity verification and statistics gathering
  • Configuration management for cleanup policies

All methods return DTOs instead of entities to maintain separation of concerns. Implementations must ensure:

  • All cleanup operations are transactional and can be rolled back on failure
  • Resource-intensive operations respect cancellation tokens and report progress
  • Image cache cleanup uses efficient file system operations with proper error handling
  • Protected items (starred/favorite) are never deleted regardless of age
  • All operations are logged with appropriate detail levels for debugging

Methods

AnalyzeCleanupAsync(int, CancellationToken)

Analyzes the potential impact of a cleanup operation without executing it.

Task<CleanupAnalysisDto> AnalyzeCleanupAsync(int retentionDays, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Parameters

retentionDays int

Number of days to use as retention threshold for the analysis.

cancellationToken CancellationToken

A CancellationToken to observe while waiting for the task to complete.

Returns

Task<CleanupAnalysisDto>

A Task containing projected impact metrics.

Exceptions

ArgumentOutOfRangeException

Thrown if retentionDays is less than 1.

OperationCanceledException

Thrown if the operation is canceled via the cancellation token.

CleanupImageCacheAsync(int, int, CancellationToken)

Performs cleanup of the image cache directory based on age and size constraints.

Task<ImageCacheCleanupResultDto> CleanupImageCacheAsync(int maxAgeDays = 30, int maxSizeMB = 500, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Parameters

maxAgeDays int

Maximum age in days for cached images.

maxSizeMB int

Maximum total size in megabytes for the cache.

cancellationToken CancellationToken

A CancellationToken to observe while waiting for the task to complete.

Returns

Task<ImageCacheCleanupResultDto>

A Task containing the cleanup results.

Exceptions

ArgumentOutOfRangeException

Thrown if maxAgeDays is less than 1 or maxSizeMB is less than 50.

OperationCanceledException

Thrown if the operation is canceled via the cancellation token.

Updates the cleanup configuration settings.

A CancellationToken to observe while waiting for the task to complete.

Returns

Exceptions
